title: (x) Spring Valley Dairy - Pretorian, Mistral {Patricia, Mark S}
content: We've Got Your Dairy could be [Mistral](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-mistral/) stretched but it's hard to tell with such a small sample.
author: pattyfab

comments.content:
Ow! My eyes!   
   
This is an old face that used to be carried by Letraset called [Pretorian](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/pretorian-dt/). I'm guessing they blew their whole budget on the font and didn't have any money left to hire a designer.
Hey, are we allowed to comment on the quality of the samples? I've been trying to be so polite...

Since this DTP Types, "started in 1989", surely doesn't own   
the rights to this old typeface, I thought I'd mention two other,   
reasonably priced sources.   
   
The Solotype Catalog shows this typeface under the name   
Pretoria (no n on the end). Brendel Informatik digitized it by   
that name and offers it via the [Quick Brown Fox](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225128/http:/www.qbf.de/tceng.htm) website.   
   
Dieter Steffmann digitized it as [Vivian](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225128/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/v/vivian.htm).
Or just say : "Ow! My eyes! Shakira"
